Job Title: Retail Account Representative Lead

Location: Tempe, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Sales

Description:
Who is Swire Coca-Cola? We are one of the largest bottlers of Coca-Cola and other beverage brands in America. Our 7,200 hardworking and passionate employees produce and distribute more than 50 brands and flavors across 13 states. We have as many careers as we have flavors, and regardless of which role you choose, you have a direct impact on Swire Coca-Cola, our products, and the communities we call home.

At Swire Coca-Cola, our commitment to excellence is what guides our actions with our employees. We offer a comprehensive benefits package for full-time associates which includes: Medical, Dental, Vision, 401K, Paid Vacation, Paid Holidays and Company Discounts.

What does a Retail Account Representative Lead do at Swire Coca-Cola?

Promotes the growth and development of the full portfolio of Coca-Cola products and build trust with our customers by being the beverage industry expert, executing promotional activities and ensuring that accounts are merchandised in accordance with company standards and the stores Joint Business Plan (JBP).

Responsibilities:

 Interact and built rapport with decision makers in each customer location. Place order of product to be delivered maintaining sufficient inventory levels for consumers purchase  Manage and fill customer beverage section, build displays, fill coolers and all points of availability, ensuring they are properly stocked, maintained and rotated per company standard  Supervise and collaborate with Retail Account Representatives, to ensure that accounts are stocked and displays are built in alignment with company standards and store management  Rotate products to ensure that store follows a “first in - first out” stocking system by removing and organizing product on shelfs  Sell in additional displays, new products and other promotional items throughout the assigned store to increase sales volume and generate additional sales revenue  Ensure Joint Business Plans (JBP) are followed throughout the year by regularly confirming with their Field Sales Manager and customer location on the details of the JBP  Maintain backroom stock areas in a safely accessible stack formation within the assigned storage area. Write up credits and confirm the credits are ready for pick up by bulk driver  Attend meetings as assigned and assist with special projects and events  Covers Retail Account Representatives duties when necessary 

Requirements:

 High School Diploma (or GED) required or equivalent degree/certificate preferred  Must be at least 18 years of age  Must have a valid driver’s license  Driving record must meet Swire’s vehicle policy requirements  Work weekends and holidays as directed by the business  Lift to 50 pounds 

Swire Coca-Cola is an equal employment opportunity and affirmative action employer that participates in the E-Verify program as required by law. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, Veteran status or other legally protected characteristics.

Apply Now

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
